titleStmt.title: The pleasant and sweet history of patient Grissell Shewing how she from a poore mans daughter, came to be a great lady in France, being a petterne for all vertuous vvomen. Translated out of Italian.
Decameron. Day 10. Novel 10. English
titleStmt.author: Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. P[urslowe] for Iohn Wright, ..,

notesStmt.note: Based on day 10, novel 10 of: Boccaccio, Giovanni. Decamerone.
Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
A1r has half title reading: The history of the noble Marques.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
